Copy Folder/Select Archive Location Dialog Box

Use the Copy Folder/Select Archive Location dialog box of Copy Folder (Edit | Copy) to select a location for the project archives.

Field Descriptions

Use existing archive location Select to continue using the archives in the location defined by the 5.3/6.0 project root.
Copy archives to project location Select to copy the archives to the project database location and update only these archives when checking in workfiles (the original archives will not be updated).

See Also

Copying Projects
